verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: < p >] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [V: is] [ARGM-TMP: still] [ARG2: angry at Justin Trudeau for a perceived slight during a speech by the Canadian prime minister following the G-7] meeting.</p >
< p > President Donald Trump is still angry at Justin Trudeau for a [V: perceived] [ARG1: slight] during a speech by the Canadian prime minister following the G-7 meeting.</p >
< p > President Donald Trump is still angry at Justin Trudeau for a perceived slight during a speech by the Canadian prime minister [V: following] [ARG2: the G-7] meeting.</p >
